survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback from students and staff on current and potential campus sustainability initiatives to improve environmental practices and awareness.

questions.question_text: How aware are you of the current sustainability initiatives on campus?
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale for consistency. Ensure the question is mobile-friendly.

script.question_text: How aware are you of the current sustainability initiatives on campus?

questions.question_text: Which of the following campus sustainability initiatives have you participated in? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Use checkboxes for multiple selections. Ensure the question is clear and concise.

script.question_text: Which of the following campus sustainability initiatives have you participated in? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: What additional sustainability initiatives would you like to see implemented on campus?
questions.client_notes: Use an open-text field to capture detailed responses. Ensure the field is mobile-friendly.

script.question_text: What additional sustainability initiatives would you like to see implemented on campus?

questions.question_text: How likely are you to participate in future sustainability initiatives on campus?
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale for consistency. Ensure the question is mobile-friendly.

script.question_text: How likely are you to participate in future sustainability initiatives on campus?

questions.question_text: What barriers, if any, prevent you from participating in campus sustainability initiatives?
questions.client_notes: Use an open-text field to capture detailed responses. Ensure the field is mobile-friendly.

script.question_text: What barriers, if any, prevent you from participating in campus sustainability initiatives?
